title: 3 killed, 2 others injured in shooting at bar in Fort Wayne, Indiana
content:
Police say three men are dead and two other people are injured following a shooting at a bar in northeastern Indiana.
Police spokesman John Chambers told WANE-TV that officers responded just before 2:30 a.m. Tuesday to Sports & Spirits in Fort Wayne and found several people inside and outside the bar. Officers and paramedics found the victims as people were cleared from the building.
The (Fort Wayne) Journal-Gazette reports that the men were pronounced dead at the scene. Two other people who were taken to a hospital are listed in good condition.
Witnesses told police they heard gunshots inside the bar and saw a person running away. Police haven't release information about any suspects.
Fort Wayne is about 120 miles northeast of Indianapolis.
Associated Press
